banner.label: Discover
banner.heading: Fabric Jumpstart
banner.desc: High quality demos and tutorials with one-click install that are near guaranteed to work with minimal dependencies:

codeSnippet.code:
import fabric_jumpstart as js

# Browse available jumpstarts
js.list()

# Install a scenario
js.install("retail-sales")

rowSection.label: Our Mission
rowSection.heading: Community-driven and committed to open source
desc: Our mission to support the open-source community, where we can all build on the amazing work of others on Fabric.

We do this by providing detailed guides, automation and reproducible code samples — everything you need to become productive quickly. Our extensive code reviews, high-bar for quality and Continuous Integration testing ensures Jumpstart is always reliable.
Currently, we're committed to supporting over 30 open-source Jumpstart scenarios.

rowSection.label: Demos
rowSection.heading: See Fabric Jumpstart in action
desc: Get inspired by game-changing solutions built on Fabric — see every scenario in a bite-sized demo.
Want to see your demo featured here?

link.text: Fill out this submission form for Jumpstart Lightning.

rowSection.label: EXPERIENCE THE POWER OF MICROSOFT FABRIC
rowSection.heading: Deploy quickly. Test easily. Evaluate confidently.
desc: Jumpstart lets you build data-driven experiences and taste the problem-solving capabilities of Microsoft Fabric in minutes.
Rapidly experience Microsoft Fabric - a unified data platform that brings data engineering, analytics, and governance together on a single, scalable foundation.
